data.text: @TaxpayerJoe @VOCMOpenline He's a reality show thief declared bankruptcy 6 times, banks stopped lending him, he stiffed creditors, falsely sold Trump University ripped off students and he's generally a douchebag.
@VOCMOpenline Yes!!!! 🙌🏼
@TaxpayerJoe @VOCMOpenline Lol 👍🏻
@TaxpayerJoe Putting show in quotations proves you’re an idiot, it is literally a show. Charlie Kirk might need a RT, run along.
@TaxpayerJoe Wait now...you haven’t insulted me?
@TaxpayerJoe You call the PM of your own country a moron and yet I have to read your silly thin skinned tweets defending the biggest asshole on earth. Which is trump btw

@TaxpayerJoe Everyone laughed at it because it was pure nonsense, which is in lock step with all the rest of your nonsense. Sorry you’re sooooo hurt when someone criticizes your boy. It must be painful and dismal to live your life. Get lost
@TaxpayerJoe Chicken shit
@TaxpayerJoe Check my knowledge when you call.
@TaxpayerJoe Call. Dare ya.
@TaxpayerJoe No, it’s not accurate. It’s actually the dumbest comment anyone has ever sent me or my bosses. We all laughed at it
@TaxpayerJoe You support the ill informed liar, that’s your problem. Why is it you soil your trunks when someone dare criticize trump?
@TaxpayerJoe Those poor snowflakes. My heart bleeds for ye.
@VOCMOpenline That’s no way to talk about our former First Lady. I would expect better from a gentleman.

@TaxpayerJoe You offer zero to any ,meaningful discussion. This guy said I’d drive away American companies from the NL offshore if I was mean to trump. That’s the mindset of these people. Dim dim dim. Send another meme and then run off to your echo chamber of weirdos
@TaxpayerJoe @VOCMOpenline Trudeau has two University degrees. This is not 'talk'. It's a fact. You lot are impervious to facts.

@VOCMOpenline So sorry you haven’t gotten past the first stage of grief since the Hillary debacle. If you keep jousting at imaginary windmills you will never resolve your deep emotional issues. Bless you.
@VOCMOpenline One might even say, they're a basket of deplorables. Hmm, where have I heard that before?
@VOCMOpenline I don't like either, then again, the Republicans & Democrats, like the liberals and conservatives here in  Canada, are just two sides of the same coin, very little difference.
@cmbutt114 Anyone is better than Cruz.
@VOCMOpenline Texas doesn't have great options, Cruz is a nightmare, and Beto isn't any better. What kind of a person drives drunk and then attempts to leave the scene of an accident?
@VOCMOpenline Trudeau is headed to Texas?
@VOCMOpenline I can’t wait for revisionist history in 10 years when nobody admitted they voted for him or say they didn’t vote for him, lol
